version_description:
*Add GEOIP Rule
*Add custom DNS Address
*Add Async DNS request
*Add DNS Result record
*Fix port parser errors in a few requests
*Optimize UDP proxy

*Fix VPN crash in partial encryption
*Fix crash in iPad
*Fix configuration bug

*ssr support
*Add configuration via QR code scan
*Add configuration via Clipboard
*Optimize network speed
*New home UI
*Optimize configuration operations
*Bug fix

-ss suport simple-obfs
-new statistics page
-optimize memory
-bug fix

- Widget:Now You can open VPN without opening the app.
- Concurrent DNS: Loon will request dns to multiple servers simultaneously at the same time.
- Cache recent DNS result
- Fix GEOIP bug

Version 2.0 is a major update. We have brought many useful and convenient features.
- Completely new user interface and interaction design
- Policy group, Support import remote nodes
- More stable and reliable
- HTTPS Decrypt
- Save sessions
-Fix crash in load configuration

-Use javaScript to extend proxy functionality
-Optimize proxy performance
-Bug fix

-Support Trojan
-Performance optimization
-Bug fix

-Support TLS1.3
-Support load balancing policy
-Performance optimization
-Bug fix

-Adding plug-in functionality
-Add wifi sharing
-ios14 Adaptations
-Bug fix

- Performance optimization
- Fix some crash
- Fix domain-keyword rule match bug

-Improve script execution performance
-Enhanced UI Interaction
-More app icons
-Bug Fix

-Optimized script support
-ICMP support
-Bug fix

-IPV6 bug fix
-Policy Group load bug fix

-Policy Group bugfix
-IPV6 bugfix

-Optimize network throughput
-Simpler and more convenient policy groups
-UDP Proxy Forwarding
-Better IPv6 compatibility
-Tcp Fast Open

-Add policy group icon
-Performance Optimization
-Fix FastOpen bug

-New protocol: VLESS
-List of script execution history
-Scripting optimisation
-BugFix

- Professional packet capture analysis mode
- Greater network throughput capacity
- Script support binary data mode
- More bug fix
-Fix network anomalies notification bug

-More powerful and improved policy groups
-More Scripting APIs
-Performance Optimization
-Bug Fix

- Add vmess aead head support
- Add trojan udp support
- BugFix

- Fake IP BugFix
- Add Trojan + Websocket support
- UI optimisation
